Package org.apache.xpath.functions

Implements XPath functions -- each function is derived from Function, FunctionOneArg, Function2Args, etc, with number-of-arguments checking being applied mainly at compile time -- this package only implements XPath functions, XSLT functions are found in the "templates" package.

See: Description

    FuncAbs
    Implementation of an XPath 3.1 function fn:abs.
    FuncAvg
    Implementation of an XPath 3.1 function fn:avg.

    Execute the SystemProperty() function.

    Implementation of the tail() function.
    Function
    This is a superclass of all XPath functions.
    Function2Args
    Base class for functions that accept two arguments.
    Function3Args
    Base class for functions that accept three arguments.
    Function4Args
    Base class for functions that accept four arguments.
    FunctionDef1Arg
    Base class for functions that accept one argument that can be defaulted if not specified.
    FunctionMultiArgs
    Base class for functions that accept an undetermined number of multiple arguments.
    FunctionOneArg
    Base class for functions that accept one argument.
    FuncTransform
    Implementation of XPath 3.1 function, fn:transform.
    FuncTrue
    Execute the True() function.
    FuncUnordered
    Implementation of the unordered() function.
    FuncUnparsedEntityURI  
    FuncUnparsedText
    Implementation of the unparsed-text() function.
    FuncUnparsedTextLines
    Implementation of the fn:unparsed-text-lines function.
    RegexEvaluationSupport
    This class provides supporting implementation, common to all XPath 3.1 functions and the XSLT instruction xsl:analyze-string that require regex functionality.
    XPathDynamicFunctionCall
    This class implements an XPath 3.1 dynamic function call, and XDM map & array information lookup using function call syntax and unary lookup syntax respectively.
    XSL3ConstructorOrExtensionFunction
    An object of this class represents an XPath constructor function, XSL stylesheet function or Xalan-J's extension function.
    XSL3FunctionService
    This class provides support to evaluate XPath 3.1 "XML Schema constructor function calls" and "named function references", and "XSL stylesheet function calls".
    XSLFunctionBuilder
    This class provides a wrapper to instantiate an object of class XSLFunctionService, that supports evaluation of XPath 3.1's XML Schema constructor function calls and XSL stylesheet function calls.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    WrongNumberArgsException
    An exception that is thrown if the wrong number of arguments to an exception are specified by the stylesheet.

Package org.apache.xpath.functions Description

Implements XPath functions -- each function is derived from Function, FunctionOneArg, Function2Args, etc, with number-of-arguments checking being applied mainly at compile time -- this package only implements XPath functions, XSLT functions are found in the "templates" package.
